name: Dawn Of Chaos
description:
Aim Survive the zombie apocalypse... Dodge the bomb barrage while destroying zombies.  Switch between your weapons for an AOE damage grenade or a single target fast shooting pistol. Controls WASD/Arrow - Move Space - Jump Right Mouse - Fire Scroll/1/2 - Weapon Shift X - Quit to Main Menu Issues There seems to be some glitches some times. Don't worry just keep on playing the game ;) Also sometimes the high score doesn't update properly :( Trivia

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

This time I kept the game play very minimal and focused on learning 3d Modelling.

Some models have some issues but some others turned out to be great.
Learned a lot of new stuff making this game.

Credits Fall of the Solar King by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org) In the Past by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
